summary: Recreated my party's favorite DnD tavern and their characters, and made them available as followers
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS]Just drag the file into the data folder, you can recruit all the party members as followers and take them on your own adventures. Please keep them distracted so that I can pull more of the campaign out of my ass.
[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Tavern is located at the Solitude docks and has a fast travel marker once discovered. If you can't get into any door inside, look for Nancy's Key.

[/font][b]Follower Details:
[/b]
[color=#ffe599]Alex the Human Cleric:[/color] A good-natured cleric. Summons a sword and uses healing magic. Means well, but had the highest kill count for the first session. [color=#ff0000]Currently deceased.[/color] Can be found leaning against the railing, watching.

[color=#e06666]Alex the Human Berserker:[/color] A rage-filled ex-cleric on the warpath. Resurrected to avenge his own death. Can be found in the cellar. Uses a greatsword.

[color=#ff0000]Sarcio the Orc Rogue:[/color] A brutish, cutthroat Orc rogue. Has a love for alcohol and a particular hatred for bears, on which he uses his twin axes. Can be found upstairs in his room, sleeping off a hangover.

[color=#1155cc]Frederick the Elf Mage[/color][color=#1e84cc]:[/color] A somewhat dopey but well-meaning Elf scholar/mage. Focuses mostly on destruction magic. Can be found sitting at the table, studying his books and learning new spells.

[color=#38761d]Gilmyn the Human Fighter:[/color] A rugged, doesn't-have-time-for-this-shit human fighter. Just wants to make it through the day with a few coins more in his pockets. Can be found lurking in the corner, looking for his next opportunity.

[color=#c27ba0]Arianne the Human Archer:[/color] A young, naive ex-barmaiden thrust into the world of adventuring after killing her employer (Not Nancy.) [color=#ff0000]Currently deceased.[/color] Can be found sweeping the floor next to the [color=#ff7700]Baz[/color] pen.

[color=#9900ff]Raven (Renberland) the Human Crusader:[/color] A warrior whose homeland was destroyed by the emperor of a far away land. Seeks to reclaim his homeland and avenge the deaths of his people. Likes birbs, can be found [s]flirting with[/s] talking to Nancy.

[color=#e69138]Terion the Elf Merchant:[/color] A smooth talking elf businessman with a taste for even smoother liquor. Fights with a bow, though he doesn't fight often. Addicted to "Natty Light"

[b]Non-Follower Characters:

[/b][color=#ff00ff]Nancy the Tavern Wench: [/color]The finest barmaid this side of the western continent, or in this case, Tamriel. She may be old, but her beauty ain't fading. Owns this fine establishment and has the best rates in town.

[color=#00ff00]Mike the "Ex"-Smuggler:[/color] Nancy's business partner. Helps Nancy out with tasks to keep the tavern running, such as ordering supplies and cooking, as well as selling merchandise in other places. 

[color=#ff7700]Baz and Bazi Worker:[/color] A race of mutated humanoids that dwells in the sewers of cities. Capable of basic speech, often used as slave labor. Not considered people, but eating them is frowned upon.

[color=#00ffff]The Dungeon Master:[/color] [b][color=#000000]████████   ██████   ███████   ██   █████   █████████████   ██████   ██████████████   ██████████████   ██████████   ███████[/color][/b]
author: Walrus
